channel.title: Kind of dumb question
channel.description: if easyrsc is based off rscd then why do some of the items like the different color masks, or the legendary axe can be spawned? as soon as i spawn them the client crashes. I'm kind of new to this coding thing, is it because the client isn't updated all the way? idk. Don't flame me im just asking a simple question.

item.title: Kind of dumb question
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

[quote=“mubby, post:11, topic:267926”][quote author=pesterd link=topic=353706.msg2710257#msg2710257 date=1237253369]

Yeah, and i thought it was supposed to be just like the original rscdv25 with improvements being identical to RSC.

Lol you thought wrong they completely messed around with their animations.rscd and itemdef’s adding/changing like everything claiming it to be custom
[/quote]
Alright calm down.[/quote]
I happened to be very calm, did you notice a vibrant change in my expressions?

Read full topic

xEnt:

item.title: Kind of dumb question
item.dc:creator: @_Halloween ~Halloween~
item.description:
@_Halloween wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:5, topic:267926”]Honestly im a little pissed off.

When i first decided ill turn an rscd into easyrsc (which was quite a lot of work) i figured id choose the most up to date rscd (at the time there was a thread by marwolf i think, which was supposed to be a community rscd updated through svn) so at that point i figured id just use that.

Turns out that had been screwed around with so much that many things stopped working, i have had to fix about 5 things that originally were fine in rscd. This here i assume is because the XML data file’s have the item def’s customly added past where rscdv25 left of, since im using the original rscdv25 client your client will crash, ill have to fix this in 1.2[/quote].

ahh that clears things up. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Kind of dumb question
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

xEnt the reason for that is because He added his own custom sprites and changed around many item colors and defs. Check Darscape.ord Development, they have new items posted which were added in game

Read full topic

item.title: Kind of dumb question
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Honestly im a little pissed off.

When i first decided ill turn an rscd into easyrsc (which was quite a lot of work) i figured id choose the most up to date rscd (at the time there was a thread by marwolf i think, which was supposed to be a community rscd updated through svn) so at that point i figured id just use that.

Turns out that had been screwed around with so much that many things stopped working, i have had to fix about 5 things that originally were fine in rscd. This here i assume is because the XML data file’s have the item def’s customly added past where rscdv25 left of, since im using the original rscdv25 client your client will crash, ill have to fix this in 1.2

Read full topic

item.title: Kind of dumb question
item.dc:creator: @lolwat22 lolwat22
item.description:
@lolwat22 wrote:

How isn’t it updated all the way? That doesn’t even make sense, the base of the client is the actual rscd client just with modifications to make it work with client-registration and not website-registration. Also, what does this have to do with development? You should of asked in the help section.

Read full topic
